2075210.name: Silent Bloom
2075210.description:
the Soul Is Like A Flower, The Body Is The Garden For It To Grow...

Silent Bloom Is A Solo-Developed, Hand-Drawn, First Person Swordplay, 3d Action Adventure That Combines Puzzle Solving With Dungeon Crawling Gameplay.
Explore Through Multiple Environments Faced With Dynamic Enemies And Puzzles That Grow Challenging As You Go On.
Uncover The Dark Mystery That Dwells Within The Walls Of An Old Lost Forgotten School University Campus, While Diving Deep Into The Soul Labyrinth Of Another Life, Left Forgotten By Time. Discover Different Paths As You Shift Back And Forth Between 2 Diverse Puzzling Atmospheric Worlds. You Are Tasked With Building A Bouquet, A Tool Used By Floral Exorcist To Exorcise Lost Stranded Spirits.

Features

Exploration
-As You Travel You Will Explore The Remnants Of An Old University Compass And The Purgatory World Of An Evil Spirit. Travel Through Atmospheric Worlds
As You Solve Puzzles And Tangle With Some Formidable Foes.

Combat
-You Will Face Up Against Some Of The Very Strange And Strong Adversaries. They Are Poltergeist Possessed Entities Wanting Nothing More Than To Stop You. Engage With An Enemy That Deals Blows Simultaneously As You. Block And Parry Strong Enemies In Order To Bring Them Down With A Strike Attack.


Life And Death
-As You Travel You Will Come Across Harp Instruments Stranded About, They're Are Save Points And Checkpoints. Even If You Are To Fall During Combat You Will Be Recalled To Your Last Checkpoint, For A Fee Of Course (❁´◡`❁). There Is Also Passive Regeneration That Keeps Your Health And Stamina Charging At All Times.

Companionship
-It Is Dangerous To Travel Alone, So Your Sister Travels With You. She's A Helpful Companion Who Will Never Leave Your Side, And She Brings Her Own Set Of Useful Features For You.
  • Torch: If You Need A Light In A Dark Place, Got You Covered
  • Travel: Travel To Your Previous Checkpoint Without Losing Progress, Only Essence.
  • Help: If Your Feeling Lost Or Need A Reminder Of Where To Go, Your Sister Can Give You Hints That Will Hopefully Get You Back On Track.



Feel Free To Join Our Community Discord
